${ModID}:StagLeap.NAME: Stag Leap
${ModID}:StagLeap.DESCRIPTION: {@@}ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Enter ${ModID}:Cunning. Exhaust{!Upgrades!|>0=ive !stslib:ex!}.

${ModID}:TimeStep.NAME: Time Step
${ModID}:TimeStep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength, plus 1 for each unique Stance you've been in this combat.

${ModID}:PullBack.NAME: Pull Back
${ModID}:PullBack.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Enter Calm. NL At the start of your next turn, enter ${ModID}:Aggression.

${ModID}:FanKick.NAME: Fan Kick
${ModID}:FanKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Changes effect based on your Stance.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: *None: Draw a card which enters a Stance.
*Weaver: Your next *Woven card created costs 1 less.

${ModID}:PivotStrike.NAME: Pivot Strike
${ModID}:PivotStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain [E] the next time you enter a Stance.

${ModID}:Pirouette.NAME: Pirouette
${ModID}:Pirouette.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. NL If X is 0, enter ${ModID}:Ancient.

${ModID}:DanceOfTheDead.NAME: Dance of the Dead
${ModID}:DanceOfTheDead.DESCRIPTION: Target loses 4 HP. They lose !M! more whenever you enter a Stance.
